Mary B. Burgoyne

  1. Foster Name: Pearl Marie
  2. Foster Family: Frank and Grace L. Thomas
  3. Location of Family: Davenport, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Hebron, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1904-05-15, Maine
  8. Date of Death: 1993-10-04
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Pearl M. Miller
  11. Source: OTR 103; Eloise Thomsen Corres. Grit 2 January 1983; Omaha World-Herald, 31 October 1982; National Orphan Train Complex; Find-A-Grave; Hebron Journal, 27 September 1907.
